messages.subject: MHEA conference/Daniel Pink
messages.msgSnippet: Hi back to Danielle, You trouble maker!!  I too enjoyed Daniel Pink s talk and I got a free autographed book!  I am reading it now.  I am wondering if his
messages.messageBody:
"Hi" back to Danielle,

You trouble maker!! I too enjoyed Daniel Pink's talk and I got a free autographed book! I am reading it now. I am wondering if his kids will stay in school also. I did enjoy listening to the HS "graduates" discuss their paths. I loved sitting next to some unschoolers at the resource booth. I enjoyed listening to a few veteran unschoolers counsel newbies in the unschooler chat area. I did not make it to any of the unschooler workshops/discussions. There was still a blur between unschooling and eclectic homeschooling (one workshop had curriculum info???).
I can't wait for Live and Learn and the "real thing"!

Beth in MD
First up with a headache...now flying on Excedrin

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
